TopicTitle: What is the best KSP glitch ever.

Articles.Content: With 1.0 around the corner, fixing a lot of bugs and glitches, I just like to see what your favourite glitches are.

Just look up Danny2462's YouTube channel if you want glitches ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

For me, personally, it's the one where a slow-speed collision crashed the game and, upon reload, sent a single cockpit flying out of the solar system.

KRAKEN DRIVES!

They're so fun! : DDDDDDDDD

Still my favorite glitch, literally made me lol:
